verses.text: Some \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w later|strong="H1961"\w*, \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w succeeded|strong="H8478"\w* \w by|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hanun|strong="H2586"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* said, “\w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w Hanun|strong="H2586"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nahash|strong="H5176"\w*, \w just|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w* \w showed|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w*.” \w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w some|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w console|strong="H5162"\w* \w Hanun|strong="H2586"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5162"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*. \w But|strong="H5973"\w* \w when|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* arrived \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*,

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Hanun|strong="H2586"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w shaved|strong="H1548"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w each|strong="H3947"\w* man’s \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*, \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w garments|strong="H4063"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* hips, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* men, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* thoroughly \w humiliated|strong="H3637"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*, “\w Stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w beards|strong="H2206"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w grown|strong="H6779"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* \w realized|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w become|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stench \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w hired|strong="H7936"\w* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* thousand Aramean \w foot|strong="H7273"\w* \w soldiers|strong="H7273"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Beth-rehob|strong="H1050"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zoba|strong="H6678"\w*, \w as|strong="H3588"\w* well \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Maacah|strong="H4601"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tob|strong="H2897"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3318"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w arrayed|strong="H6186"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6186"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w at|strong="H4421"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w city|strong="H8179"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, while \w the|strong="H3318"\w* Arameans \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zobah|strong="H6678"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Rehob|strong="H7340"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tob|strong="H2897"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Maacah|strong="H4601"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6186"\w* \w in|strong="H4421"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* open \w country|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w command|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* brother Abishai, \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w arrayed|strong="H6186"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*.

“\w If|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Arameans \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*,” said Joab, “\w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w rescue|strong="H3467"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w*, \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* \w rescue|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H3068"\w* \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w us|strong="H6213"\w* fight bravely \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*. \w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5066"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* advanced \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w fight|strong="H4421"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Arameans, \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Arameans \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* been \w defeated|strong="H5062"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* regrouped.

\w Hadadezer|strong="H1909"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* messengers \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* more Arameans \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H5104"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w they|strong="H6440"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Helam|strong="H2431"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w Shobach|strong="H7731"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Hadadezer|strong="H1909"\w*’s \w army|strong="H6635"\w* \w leading|strong="H8269"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w When|strong="H5674"\w* \w this|strong="H5674"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w reported|strong="H5046"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w gathered|strong="H1732"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w went|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Helam|strong="H2431"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Arameans \w arrayed|strong="H6186"\w* \w themselves|strong="H6186"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* Arameans \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w charioteers|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* forty thousand foot \w soldiers|strong="H6635"\w*. \w He|strong="H8033"\w* \w also|strong="H1732"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w down|strong="H5221"\w* \w Shobach|strong="H7731"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w*, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*.
